item.title: Digital Transformation
item.description: INTRODUCTION Digital transformation may be explained as the renovation of organizational and business process, activities, models and competencies to be able to fully leverage and capitalize on opportunities and avenues provided by a mix of digital technologies. In this document, two articles are summarised, and an effort is made to shed more light on Data Driven Decision making (DDD) and on the importance of strategy in digital transformation which comes from the insights obtained from the articles.
